lead_paragraph: Federal and local prosecutors say they are investigating the October shooting death by the Chicago police of an alleged knife-wielding teenager.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Police Killing of Teenager Is Under Investigation
headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Police Killing of Teenager Is Under Investigation

snippet: Federal and local prosecutors say they are investigating the October shooting death by the Chicago police of an alleged knife-wielding teenager.
abstract: Federal and local prosecutors say they are investigating October 2014 shooting death by the Chicago police of alleged knife-wielding teenager Laquan McDonald, who was shot 16 times.
